TextBlock.Text: SOLANUM: Ah, this is my home... it was. Even my toys are still here... See? The <color=orange>Eye</color> has always fascinated me since I was a child.
SOLANUM: Obviously, it has no reason to wait for us, but my dad and the others were blinded by the desire for knowledge.
SOLANUM: The whole city, elders and kids, all turned to ashes... This is very hard to handle. It doesn't make it feel any better knowing that I'm the last Nomai alive.
SOLANUM: At least now I can say goodbye to them... and... please stand back. There is more that needs to be turned into ash...
